commands: Available commands: 🗓 /list Shows active tasks for this chat. 🗑 /del 1, 2, ...id Deletes tasks by id. 🗑 /del 1-10, A-B Deletes all tasks within range. #️⃣ /N Deletes N-th task. 🌐 /tz Configures time zone.
voiceMessageTooBig: ⚠️ Voice message duration should be less than 30 seconds.
shouldRemove: ⚠️ Please remove some of your schedules.
errorScheduling: Can not schedule for this date.
tzWarning: ⚠️ Please select your time zone by typing /tz
tzConfiguration: 🛠 To configure time zone you can either:
tzGroupChatConfiguration: 🛠 To configure time zone type GMT offset in ±HH:MM format.
tzTypeManuallyReponse: Type your GMT offset in ±HH:MM format.
tzInvalidInput: 🚫 Please enter valid GMT offset in ±HH:MM format, where ± — plus or minus, HH - hours, MM - minutes.
tzCancelWarning: ❗️ Please note that defining time zone increases time accuracy.
